title: Now, where have I heard that before?
author: VD
content_html:
Don Banks writes on SI:

Tennessee: Now that the Super Bowl window of opportunity has slammed shut for this particular Tennessee team — which was decimated by the news this week that six of its premier players would be cap cuts — the franchise faces a full-blown rebuilding project for the first time since leaving Houston. With the Titans expected to have little to no profile in free agency, getting the draft right will be more important than ever.

I seem to recall writing something similar… in what, week three?
content_text:
Don Banks writes on SI:
Tennessee: Now that the Super Bowl window of opportunity has slammed shut for this particular Tennessee team — which was decimated by the news this week that six of its premier players would be cap cuts — the franchise faces a full-blown rebuilding project for the first time since leaving Houston. With the Titans expected to have little to no profile in free agency, getting the draft right will be more important than ever.
I seem to recall writing something similar… in what, week three?
